tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I took Dr. Rohly for Gen Chem 1 and he was an amazing prof. His lectures were always clear, he had us do worksheets together in class, and you knew exactly what to study for the tests. He\'d even give us a few "despair" photos at the beginning of his lecture slideshow with hilarious captions to brighten our moods before class.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: At first I was very unsure about Dr. Rohly because he was introducing a new grading online homework scheme and seemed very aloof about the whole situation. As we settled into the class, however, I realized that Rholy is a few things: he is very funny, incredibly smart, and he is respectful and helpful with his feedback. Also being super nice helps.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Dr. Rohly is AMAZING!! He makes class fun and interesting. His tests are super easy if you pay attention in class. No surprises on test. I recommend taking him if you have the chance. I had him for gen chem. 1. At first, he seems odd, but he is literally so great!

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Absolutely the best! He is understanding, caring, clear, hilarious, and very approachable. He reads students well and is more than willing to help students that are trying. Don\'t miss a chance to take a class from Dr. Rohly!!

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  HILARIOUS
comments: Dr. Rohly is the best chemistry professor Bethel has. You know EXACTLY what to expect for his exams and he takes time to go through material. He\'s also super nice and really funny which helps class not feel so brutal. 10/10 would recommend others to take him for Gen Chem 1 or 2.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: BEST PROF EVER! He was very helpful, loved chemistry, kept the class fun with chem related jokes and a witty sense of humor and prepared us well for the standardized chem exam. VERY good class. I decided to minor in chem because of him!

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Dr. Rohly is a super helpful prof. He really tries to help you understand the material. I rated this as a 3 on hardness not because he is hard, but just because the material itself can be hard. One day we had the other gen chem teacher b/c Rohly was at a conference, and he was super hard to understand and had no structure. Definatley choose Rohly.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: The best chemistry instructor I\'ve ever had. He makes difficult concepts easy to understand. Makes an effort to learn your name. If you ask him a question he will explain the answer so that you can understand it. One of the most difficult classes I\'ve ever taken, but his teaching style helped a lot! Wish he could be my Chemistry professor forever!

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Inspirational (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Very easy going, he will try to help you out and if you present him with a problem with something you think is unjust he will look into it and do something about it.
